title: Riot, What have you done!
body:
Although many people have the battle bunny riven skin, i brought the redeemed skin, and they did visuals on it and now it looks like c**p, its all bronze looking and is not the shiny, new, "angel" redeemed champion i love, every time i go to use the skin i get more and more disappointed, please riot, make her more silver colours and make her shine like she used to. to me now she is just a dim bronze clump now. please look ad fix this Riot.
Thankyou Riot, Rlg Shaky

replies.body: no this skin visual is bad, not good, please riot realise that the skin visual looks like a pile of %%%%
After the skin that gold+ players got, they needed to make something for Bronze players.

riven mains...

Q is also an Escape? Wow Coo-Wow
nah i main volibear, i still occasionally play riven and when i play with that skin i get disappointed..

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=M6pc2ERZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-26T00:34:41.387+0000)
>
> nah i main volibear, i still occasionally play riven and when i play with that skin i get disappointed..

that's even worse than maining riven.
I have battle bunny and dragonblade and I gotta say, dragonblade is the best!

Q IS AN ESCAPE?

Reason why i don't want to buy Battle Bunny Riven.

With Riven it's feed or fed.

please riot, you probably go through so many of these but I'm actually really disappointed on the way you have down the visuals on her, please riot, plan something to return the shiny bright look to her and don't just ignore this post.
